katharagama dewiyange upan dinaya samarima was agaharuwada (17) laksha sankhyatha bathumathun pirisak katharagama puda bimata paminiyaha.lankawe prawina jothishya wedin kipa denekuta anuwa medina katharagama dewiyan jiwamanawa perawaru 6 sita perawaru 7 dakwa katharagama maha dewalaye wada sitina bawath edina thamangen pihita illa paminena narayan hata pihitawan bawath me jothishya wedinge mathaya wi atha.owun wadi duratath pawasana andamata medina katharagama dewiyanta ayath kuja dina nohoth agaharuwada uda wana athara kuja ta ayath denata nakatha udawi atha.medin pandara 3 pamana wele patan maha dewalayata yamata bathimathun thel mal pahan saha puja watti athiwa pela gasi siti athara perawaru haya pamana wana wita polim kadi maha jana gangawak maha dewalaya wetha adi yannata wiya.wisheshayen kanthawanta ha kuda lamayinta me nisa mahath karadara walata muhuna pannata siduwu athara atham dena atha thibu puja watti athulu puja bhanda bima wati eewa ahula ganimata pawa nohaki wiya.jana gangawe tharama keseda yath bathimathun boho denekuta thama puja watti maha dewalayata oppu kirimata nohakiwa puja bhumiye pihiti wenath dewala walata puja karanu daknata labina.me athara wandana karuwan pawasanne me maha jana sannipathaya palanaya kota katath thamange puja katayuthu piliwelakata kara ganima sadaha baladharin wisin kisima sanwidhanathmaka wada piliwelak sakas kota nothibu bawaya.nagaraye sita puja bhumiyata athuluwana sthanaye sitama polim kramayak sakas kota thibune nam bathimathun hata itha kalathurakin udawana me awasthawen imahath prayojana ganimata ida thibu bawa owuhu pawasathi..
mama yanawa anake kallata.

pini nowatuni ape pinata rangana duni wade thithata ''me tharagayata rangana ayiyawa kandayamata athulath karanakotama mage balaporoththuwa wune brendan makalamge saha ros telarge kadulu eyata kiyala dawaganna eka gana.

loku ayiyath ithin owar tek kala, eekalla apita kathath karala tatath kiyala giya..
emenma yamkisi aarthika gatalukari thathwayakda athi wimata ada dinayedi hakiyawa pawathinawa.

rate athi mulika prashnayanta amatharawa lokayak lesa api balashakthi arbudaya, goliya deshapalanika arbuda, parisara winashaya, mathdrawya wani goliya prashnawalatada barapathala lesa sirawemin atha.

ada astonishge upan dine sellam ganak nimi 23.
apita ee koyi thanadith katha karanne shri dalada maligawe pantheru natum kandayama kiyalayi.
wasi samaya ganga diya ali aadi jalashritha parisara paddhathiwalata ekkara denne apurwa chamathkarayaki.
adatath rahasak wu mema abhiyogathmaka karyaya ohu karanne prabhakaranta muhuden paninnata ida nothabana atiyeni.

kattiyata mokak hari honda deyak karanna mathak wenne winasha wela iwara wunata passe.

shri lanka jathika maha sabhawe prathama sasiya lesa pasugiya (28) wanida bandaranayaka sammanthrana shalawedi parlimenthu manthri athuraliye rathana himige pradhanathwayen ‚Äúthirasara yugayata maga - rata hadana salasuma‚Äù lesa elidakwa athi liyawille atham karanu gana saka mathuwa athayi wartha we.
nuduru anagathayedi memagin kolambaa warayata balapam ella nowanu athayi kisiwekutath kiwa nohakiya.
anunge bola mirikana napunsakayo wenda epa.
